column4: The topic is talking about problems with the nvidia drivers... is that why the nvidia-glx package is broken?
Okay.... Just can't download the nvidia-glx drivers :(
that thing in the topic is talking about a security problem
you have to post the link
hmm seems like the dependencies are messed up the versions are wrong
so is there anything I can do about it? Or will i have to wait?
well if you really wanted to you could download the binary driver yourself
you can try installing each package seperately
well, tried the nvidia-kernel, but it had no installation candidate
do you have the restricted repo in your source.lst?
Thats the "Restricted Copyright" thing in synaptic right?
well it seems like you have that repo enabled then

usser using rm -r plus force is sorta like a format it's liek doing deltree c:\
